author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NOAA AND AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS REPORT MELISSA IS NOW DRIFTING NORTHWESTWARD... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...NOAA AND AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS REPORT MELISSA IS NOW DRIFTING NORTHWESTWARD... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 11:00 PM EDT Fri Oct 24 the center of Melissa was located near 16.1, -74.9 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...NOAA AND AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS REPORT MELISSA IS NOW DRIFTING NORTHWESTWARD... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 11:00 PM EDT Fri Oct 24 the center of Melissa was located near 16.1, -74.9 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
